this game changed my life in the best way possible, i was playing peggle nights and my girlfriend walked in. i thought she would cringe because im bad at the game, it turns out she actually really liked peggle nights and gave me some tips and tricks. for the next couple months we played the duel mode and she always won, about a year after she first saw me playing peggle nights we got married and had two beautiful children, one of them got accepted into harvard and the other became a multi millionare. over all im very glad that i spent five dollars on this life changing game.

Лучшая часть серии . Прекрасная физика разрушений , а это 2006 год выпуска игры. В общем игра как минимум достойна внимания и быть в коллекции вашей библиотеки.

Отличная игра! Она очень весёлая и динамичная. Разрушать машины и трассы очень весело, а гонки быстро проходят и не надоедают. Графика хорошая, даже спустя почти 20 лет выглядит отлично! Физика и управление машин тоже очень хороши. Музыкальное сопровождение тоже очень хорошо, особенно на фоне современной музыки в играх. Отличная игра для тех, кто любит скорость и весёлые аварии!
кайф весело
рекомендую

Машина ведет себя непредсказуемо. К управлению невозможно привыкнуть, каждый раз машина едет по-разному. Тысячу раз проезжал один и тот же поворот, и каждый раз он проезжается по-разному. То машину заносит, то не заносит. Никогда не знаешь, какой конус, попавший под колесо, отправит твою машину кувырком в кювет. Как бы ты свою машину не прокачивал, соперники всегда ездят быстрее. Прокачка в принципе безсмысленна, так как невозможно ехать быстрее ботов.
 Победы не зависят от игрока вообще.Это чистый рандом.
MY CHILDHOOD GAME!!!!

Eins der besten Rennspiele überhaupt. Früher als Kind viel gespielt und nach über 10 Jahren macht es immer noch sehr viel spaß. Die Musik ist die beste, die ich je in einem Spiel erlebt habe und macht einem richtig Laune darauf, einfach alles wegzurammen und zu zerstören :D

Kostet im Sale 2€, also kann man auch nichts mit falsch machen. Einfach ausprobieren ;)

Ragdoll minigames are still the most fun you can have ejecting a driver on purpose, the demolition derby mode is definitely the best when it comes to these games and even after all these years, it’s still the king of arcade racer carnage.
Kanser mi olmak istiyorsun kardeşim, hiç sigaraya o kadar para bayılmana gerek yok. İndiriyorsun bu oyunu, dikkatli süreceğim derken hem kolon kanseri, hem de panik atak sahibi oluyorsun.

These kinds of games hold a special place in my heart, and I will almost always recommend them. This one too I do recommend, however as with their detective games of this genre the places you look for items looks littered with random stuff. This isn't a problem as much as I've seen similar games place things more natural and elegant without the levels feeling like someone just emptied out their attics. I feel like the adjustable settings are lacking a bit, but overall a very nice but repetitive game 7/10.

Jogo bem divertido de encontrar objetos e de puzzles em geral.

this was a fun game with occasional tricky descriptions of the items but not so difficult that it's not fun! I highly recommend it!
My late date loved this game - and I played a bit of it and can see why. It is a great way to kill some time.   Sure it isn't the highest res game, but for what it is, it's fun.
I personally like this game. I enjoy the relaxing mode and the different little bits of information that is in the game.

While I'm not a fan of hidden object games, I'm going to be objective here - the main reason I do not recommend this one is because of its age.  The low resolution graphics make some objects incredibly difficult to discern while at the same time the aliasing on some objects make them practically glow!  

Stick to more HD and updated hidden object games

Hem mekanlar hem de aranan nesneler sıklıkla tekrar ediyor. Tahmini 10 saat sürecek bir işkenceye dönüşüyor. Bir önceki oyun da öyleydi, bu da öyle. Tür için başarısız bir örnek. Bunun da bir önemi kalmadı zaten. Eskiden çok ucuzdu ve indirimle falan su fiyatına geliyordu. Fiyatlandırma değiştikten sonra kimse bu oyunun yüzüne bakmaz artık.
Great locations and good variety of puzzles make this one of the most complete seek&find-games

Wow this was a great trip down memory lane and playing this game with friends. i could never finished this game back in the days, so glad i did. The EA app version didnt work but this works no problem.
I loved playing this game from years ago...and here it is on Steam!
Çok güzel.

A much older Hidden Object + Word Search + Jigsaw + Other Mini-Games Game.

If you are familiar with Mystery P.I. series?  Aka 20 Min Time Limit, Clue Search/Gems + Multiple Locations?  This is it.

It's very relaxing and fans of the Mystery P.I. series (if you actually liked those games) might enjoy it.

Newer H.O.G. players?  Nope!

But if you want to know what it was like for us...  "Old folks"...  Back then?  You are free to take a look.

Even though the company no longer exists...  It's games are still remembered...  :D
It's cute and fun. I used to love eye spy games as a kid, and the books were always a delight. This is hitting the same energy!
I should be doing my spreadsheets :D

Different name to Mystery P.I. , but it is essentially the same game.
Un clásico :3

Bof, de l'objets cachés basique, simple suite de quelques scènes qui reviennent en boucle avec quelques variations de liste.  La vague scénarisation est à peu près sans intérêt, toutes les quelques scènes un écran de texte intercalaire nous dit qu'on a trouvé un fragment qui permettra d'accéder au trésor final. Est-ce que c'est mieux que rien ? Mouais, ça se discute.
